In a vibrant meadow where colors danced, there lived a horse named Zephyr, adorned with striking zebra stripes. Unlike any other horse, Zephyr felt out of place among his solid-colored companions. One day, a group of playful zebras wandered into the meadow, intrigued by Zephyr's unique appearance. They invited him to join their games, and for the first time, Zephyr felt accepted. As they galloped under the golden sun, Zephyr realized that it wasnâ€™t his stripes that set him apart, but his spirit. From that day on, he proudly embraced his uniqueness, teaching others that differences can bring joy and friendship.
